CheckTitle: Ensure Zero Hour Purge (ZAP) is Enabled for Teams
Description: Checks if ZapEnabled is set to true for all Teams Protection Policies.
Risk: If ZAP is not enabled, malicious messages may not be purged from Teams, increasing the risk of malware or phishing.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Teams Protection. 4. Edit each policy and enable ZAP.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Zero Hour Purge (ZAP) for all Teams Protection Policies.

Notes: This check validates that ZAP is enabled for all Teams Protection Policies.
